data.title: St. James' Episcopal School
data.meta_description: Home - St. James' Episcopal School is a diverse, joyful, and inclusive community of learners who focus on academic excellence and compassion for others.
data.text:
Non-Discrimination Policy

St. James' Episcopal School admits students of any race, color, national and ethnic origin, religion and gender to all the rights, privileges, programs, and activities generally accorded or made available to students at the school. It does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national and ethnic origin, religion or gender in administration of its educational policies, admissions policies, scholarship and loan programs, and athletic and other school administered programs.
